attributes.action: Travellers to have to pay per hour for the weeks they stay in car parks just like everyone else would have to.
attributes.additional_details: Travellers park up in public car parks for weeks on end leaving a total mess. They have just as much right to park there as anyone else but should have to pay the meters like everyone else does for significantly less time in the car park. I think this should be regulated and enforced it is not fair on everyone else who actually contribute to this country.
